item.title: How to Generate Fake Data for Testing Your Rails App
item.description: For a while, I created my own test data, manually, in every single test. It was tedious and took a bit of creative energy because I also tried to make the test data Stars Wars themed ðŸ˜…. Eventually I came across some data that was a bit too tedious for me to create on my own and I decided that it was time to start generating it. And it was actually incredibly easy to implement, and I’ll never manually create test data again!
